body:
The JCIO do not accept complaints about:

* a judgeâ€™s decision
* the way a judge has managed a case

If you want to complain about a judge, tribunal member or magistrate, you can [make a complaint to the Judicial Conduct Investigation Office (JCIO)](https://judicialconduct.judiciary.gov.uk/).
heading: Complain about a judge, tribunal member or magistrate
